documents.document: I loved you before, I love you now, I'll love you still.
To keep a girl you have to: 1) Keep your promises. 2) Be romantic no matter what. 3) Be honest with her 100% of the time.
There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, or throbbing moment.
A real boyfriend and girlfriend stand by each others side on good days and stands even closer on bad days no matter what.
Girls always find things out, they might not say anything right away, but they know.
Every girl wants that one boy who's not afraid to say, "That's my girlfriend and I love her."
No matter how strong a person says that they are, they are fragile when it comes to their heart.
Girl: If the radio breaks would you sing to me? Boy: I'd break the radio just to sing to you. ♥
Everytime I see your name come up on my phone, I smile and my heart starts to beat a little faster.
I make mistakes, I know I'm not perfect. That's why I'm thankful for the true friends who stick by me knowing how I am.
Most touching line said by a best friend: "When I die, don't come near my body, because my hand may not be able to wipe your tears anymore."
You don't know what or when something will happen. It just happens naturally. Life will always surprise you. That's how everything works.
Happiness is not about having what you want. It is about enjoying what you have.
Always be thankful in live. Find a way to be thankful for your troubles and they can become your blessings.
Be with someone who won't stay mad at you, who can't stand not talking to you, and who's afraid of losing you
Kamu menjadi bahagia bukan ketika kamu mendapat apa yang kamu mau, tapi ketika kamu bersyukur atas apa yang kamu dapat.
Relationships aren't perfect. Perfection is when you and I can go through anything and still stand strong together.
In life you'll realize that there is a purpose for every person you meet. Some will teach you, and some will bring out the best in you.
Before you say something to someone, always think about how you'd feel if someone told you the same thing.
Always believe in God because there are some questions that cannot be answered by Google.
True love is when you find someone that fits in your imperfect world perfectly.
Please add my other accounts @aiqingfenxiang & @AstrologySecret. Thank you ^^
He's the guy who I'm falling in love with and he's the guy who I know is going to catch me.
When you fall for personality, everything else about them becomes beautiful.
Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
When your heart feels like giving up, let hope whisper one more time.
I'm perfect in my imperfections, happy in my pain, strong in my weaknesses and beautiful in my own way because I'm me.
Relationships do not need promises, terms, and conditions. It just needs two people. One who can trust and one who can understand.
Don't think you're the best when you're at the top. Don't think you're the worst when you're at the bottom.
A friend is like a rainbow. They brighten your life when you've been through a storm.
RT @PiscesTweet: #Pisces can never put their feelings into words, so they use music to describe their feelings.
Life is like a snowglobe, often it's prettiest after it's been turned upside-down.
Sometimes you have to let things go, not because you're giving up, but because you've realized that some things cannot be yours.
I have learned to care people too much, not because they are good but because I knew the pain of being ignored.
RT @aiqingfenxiang: 不是「晚安」這兩個字特別甜蜜和特別重要、而是重要在說的那個人是誰。
RT @PiscesTweet: 【最有结婚狂倾向的星座排名】冠军（巨蟹座）；亚军（双鱼座）；季军（处女座）；第四名（金牛座）；第五名（魔羯座）；第六名（狮子座）；第七名（天蝎座）；第八名（射手座）；第九名（天秤座）；第十名（双子座）；第十一名（白羊座）；第十二名（水瓶座 ...
I wanna be the girl he can hold hands in public and not care what anyone says.
No matter how strong of a person you are, there’s always someone who can make you weak.
Maybe she is waiting for you, but no one waits forever.
Don't date the most beautiful girl in the world, date the girl that makes your world the most beautiful.
"Love" is when you know that worst side of someone and still love the person with everything you have in your heart.
Missing someone is apart of loving them. If you're never really apart, you'll never know how strong your love is.
Being with you makes me feel like for once in my life I don't have to try so hard to be happy. It can just happen.
Sometimes just by listening to music can help you feel so much better.
I'd walk a thousand miles just to be in your arms.
He is the reason why I'm always smiling like a fool.
You are the first thing that comes up on my mind when I wake up every morning.
Remember that someday you're going to meet someone, someone who will stay forever.
Maybe I hope too much. Maybe I dream too much. But at least I won't give up until I've tried, and I won't regret anything.
Menunggu memang bukan sesuatu yang menyenangkan, tapi kadang itu cara Tuhan untuk melatih KESABARAN.
RT @PiscesTweet: 双鱼的人最不势力，从不用薪金的多少来衡量一个人的价值，他可以爱一个贫穷的人，却没办法忍受一颗贫穷的心，他可以接受寒酸婚宴，但没办法忍受没有你的房间，他愿意接受平凡的爱人，但务必给他不平凡的爱情。总之，你可以没房没车没地位，但请你好好爱他认 ...
A person who truly loves you will never let you go or give up on you, no matter how hard the situation is.
When I'm with you, I forget all my worries.
To be able to thank God under any circumstance, that is the true measure of a person.
I may not be perfect, but God is, and He loves me perfectly.
I don't know why, but I fall more in love with you everyday.
Every time you say "I love you", my heart flutters with joy.
I wish time could just stop when I'm in your arms, because it's the best feeling ever.
The purpose of faith isn't always to keep us from having trouble. It is often to carry us through trouble.
Loving someone who doesn't love you back is like hugging a cactus, the tighter you hold on, the more it hurts.
I love walking in the rain, for no one can tell if I'm crying.
God gives miracles to those who believe, courage to those with faith, hope to those who dream, and love to those who accept.
There's nothing more beautiful than gazing into the eyes of your lover and and saying "I love you."
Don't try to be good in everything. Be good in one thing. That's what makes you special.
I may not be all I should be, but I'm not what I used to be, and God isn't finished with me yet.
Everything happens for a reason. Luck and fate are the same thing, it just depends on how you look at life.
God gives me strength whenever I am weak.
If someone asks me who I want to be with, I would simply say; Someone who will never leave me because of someone else.
God knew you were going to be special to someone.. That's why He created you. Be happy with yourself, and know you are loved.
Everyday I thank God for giving me a new day, and another chance to make a difference.
If you feel like you can't go anymore just pray. God is listening and everything will be okay in His perfect timing.
After you have done all you can.. hand it over to God. Usually the BEST results are when we leave it to Him anyway.
If I had to count the reasons why I love you and why I'm so in love with you, I'd have count forever.
Anything worth having requires time, effort, and patience. With a positive attitude you can excel in whatever you put your mind to.
Happy is the person who learns to wait when they pray, because God's time is the best time.
Find strength through every struggle, because the things you have been through have made you the person who you are today.
Kesetiaan berarti ketulusan untuk menyimpan satu nama tetap di hati, kemudian berjanji untuk tidak mengkhianati.
Love between a man and a woman means being able to trust each other and believe in each other. Its not only to love and tell sweet things.
Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
Jika ia mencintaimu saat kau punya segalanya, itu Kenyataan. Jika ia mencintaimu saat kau tidak punya segalanya, itu Ketulusan.
I have embraced many beautiful memories in my life, but the one I admire the most was when I met you.
The best feeling in the world is when the person you like, like you back.
Everytime I look at the keyboard, I see that "U & I" are always together.
Stop crying over yesterday and start smiling for tomorrow.
Sometimes you need patience in order to find true happiness. It won't come fast and it won't come easy, but it will be worth it.
You speak to me with words, and I look at you with feelings.
When a girl fights for you, know that she loves you more than anything else.
Beauty isn't always about what's on the outside, but it's what's on the inside.
Distance doesn't ruin a relationship, doubts do.
A real man will love you for who you are. He won't love you because you're attractive, but he'll find you attractive because he loves you.
He accepts me for me and he loves me for who I am.
He makes me smile and laugh every time.
God designed one person special for you... Just be patient until that person shows up in your life.
EVERYTHING IS POSSIBLE! Your dreams. Your ideas. Your inventions. Your vision. Never let anyone tell you "You can't"!
God placed our heads ABOVE our hearts so that we can think OVER what we feel.
If you have a problem with someone, speak to them directly. It's not just about maturity, but also your own character.
It's better to enjoy life committing mistakes and learn rather than playing safe in your entire life and learned NOTHING at all.
Real men stay faithful. They don't have time to look for other women, because they are too busy loving the one they have.
Sometimes you just have to accept the fact that some people only enter you life as a temporary happiness.
A real man never stops trying to show his woman how much she means to him, even after he already has her.
